overview_of_class: This is the third part of intermediate Swahili. The course builds on the foundation established in the Fall and Winter sessions. It is designed to expand students' communicative skills and a deeper cultural awareness about Swahili and East Africa. By the end of the course, learners are expected to demonstrate language competence ranging from Intermediate Low to Intermediate Mid levels. To enroll in the course, a student is required to have satisfactorily completed Swahili 122-2 or the equivalent.
name: Swahili II
subject: SWAHILI
